javascript.question: Q1. Which of the following function of Array object adds and/or removes elements from an array?
Q2. Which built-in method returns the character at the specified index?
Q3. Which built-in method returns the calling string value converted to lower case?
Q4. Which of the following function of Number object returns a string value version of the current number?
Q5. Which of the following function of String object is used to match a regular expression against a string?
